mapper.select: SELECT sc.id AS cartId, sc.user_id, sc.sku_id, sc.product_id, sc.quantity, sc.checked, spu.product_name AS productName, sku.sku_price AS skuPrice, sku.sku_attr_value_names AS skuAttrValueNames, sku.sku_rate AS skuRate, sku.sku_count AS skuCount, pf.freight AS freight FROM djmall_auth_shopping_cart sc LEFT JOIN djmall_product_spu spu ON sc.product_id = spu.id LEFT JOIN djmall_product_sku sku ON sc.sku_id = sku.id LEFT JOIN djmall_dict_product_freight pf ON spu.freight_id = pf.id WHERE sc.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT sc.quantity, sc.checked, sku.sku_price AS skuPrice, sku.sku_rate AS skuRate, pf.freight AS freight, CONVERT ( sku.sku_rate * sku.sku_price * 0.01, DECIMAL (10, 2) ) AS discountPrice FROM djmall_auth_shopping_cart sc LEFT JOIN djmall_product_spu spu ON sc.product_id = spu.id LEFT JOIN djmall_product_sku sku ON sc.sku_id = sku.id LEFT JOIN djmall_dict_product_freight pf ON spu.freight_id = pf.id WHERE sc.id IN
#{id}
